metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8764 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
DokuWiki 2014-05-05a and earlier, when using Active Directory for LDAP authentication, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a user name and password starting with a null (\0) character, which triggers an anonymous bind.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8764` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1').
